mapper.sql: id, phone, password, real_name, card_no, card_img_front, card_img_back, status, register_time, pass_time, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (id, phone, password, real_name, card_no, card_img_front, card_img_back, status, register_time, pass_time, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardImgFront,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardImgBack,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{passTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update t_user
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_no = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_img_front = #{cardImgFront,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_img_back = #{cardImgBack,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
register_time = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pass_time = #{passTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_user set phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_no = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_img_front = #{cardImgFront,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_img_back = #{cardImgBack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_time = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pass_time = #{passTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select t1.* from t_user t1 right join t_order t2 on t1.id = t2.user_id where t2.id = #{orderId}
SELECT t1.* FROM t_user t1 RIGHT JOIN t_order t2 ON t1.id = t2.user_id WHERE t2.product_id = #{productId}
